property.description: Indicate to clients whether Timeline service is enabled or not. If enabled, the TimelineClient library used by end-users will post entities and events to the Timeline server.
property.name: yarn.timeline-service.enabled

property.description: The setting that controls whether yarn system metrics is published on the timeline server or not by RM.
property.name: yarn.resourcemanager.system-metrics-publisher.enabled

property.description: Indicate to clients whether to query generic application data from timeline history-service or not. If not enabled then application data is queried only from Resource Manager.
property.name: yarn.timeline-service.generic-application-history.enabled
